# Color presets

Import presets from the package:

```typst
#import "@preview/laskutys:1.1.0": PRESET-OCEAN
```

## PRESET-MINIMAL (default)

![PRESET-MINIMAL](./images/preset_minimal.svg)

## PRESET-ARCTIC

Inspirated by GMK Arctic keycaps by Mcnos.
